data.title: Experiences of Rune Sørum: Current and past positions
data.meta_description: Find out more about Rune Sørum's international, operational and industry experience. 21 positions known in addition to Director/Board Member at CondAlign AS
data.text:
Investment ManagersFinance

TeleVenture Capital AS is a venture capital investment firm based in Oslo. TeleVenture Capital traces their origins back to 1993 when the mobile telecommunications firm, Telenor Group, formed their venture capital arm, TeleVenture AS. In 1998, TeleVenture Capital AS was founded as a management firm to enable the establishment of additional venture capital funds. TeleVenture Capital focuses on investments in the information and communication technology sectors. TeleVenture Capital manages two venture capital funds, namely Telenor Venture II ASA and Telenor Venture IV AS.

Packaged SoftwareTechnology Services

Bitreactive AS develops software and java applications. It provides the Reactive Blocks Software Development Kit. With the reactive blocks, it builds applications graphically with reusable blocks, analyzes them with coverage, and generates reactive behavior automatically. The firm develops a marketplace for buying and selling of components for different applications in the Machine-to-Machine market and embedded systems. The company was founded by Frank Alexander Kraemer on June 28, 2011 and is headquartered in Trondheim, Norway.

Packaged SoftwareTechnology Services

Holberg EEG AS develops systematic computer based classification and reporting software. Its products for standardised structural interpretation, reporting and sharing of advanced diagnostic data and is currently focused in the field of electroencephalography. The company was founded by Harald Aurlien and Jan Brgger in 2009 and is headquartered in Bergen, Norway.

Industrial MachineryProducer Manufacturing

Light Structures AS is a holding company that provides fiber optic hull stress and other structure monitoring systems. It offers packaged sensor elements for strain and temperature, analyzers with control software for sensor systems, and analysis software products. The firm develops systems for hull stress monitoring, structure monitoring, general measurement, bridge monitoring, verification, and new material design applications. It provides software products for data analysis, including modules for strain and temperature, moments and forces, material utilization, fatigue, statistics, and acceleration and impact. The company was founded by Geir Skoglund Sagvolden and Karianne Pran in 2001 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

RailroadsTransportation

WaveTrain Systems AS operates as a holding company that offers road traffic, counting systems for level crossings, mobile warning and security for line works along railroad tracks. It develops a warning and safety solution for level crossings. The firm technology detects light trains and heavy trains. The company was founded in August 2009 and is headquartered in Lysaker, Norway.

Water UtilitiesUtilities

Clarity WTS AS is a holding company that offers patented technology for removal of organic waste and nutrients (also called Dissolved Organic Compounds) from water sources. The Clarity technology can be used both in salt water and fresh water. The company was founded by Steinar Joneid in 2005 and is headquartered in Trondheim, Norway.

Investment ManagersFinance

TeleVenture Capital AS is a venture capital investment firm based in Oslo. TeleVenture Capital traces their origins back to 1993 when the mobile telecommunications firm, Telenor Group, formed their venture capital arm, TeleVenture AS. In 1998, TeleVenture Capital AS was founded as a management firm to enable the establishment of additional venture capital funds. TeleVenture Capital focuses on investments in the information and communication technology sectors. TeleVenture Capital manages two venture capital funds, namely Telenor Venture II ASA and Telenor Venture IV AS.

Information Technology ServicesTechnology Services

Rubik Solutions Group AS provides information technology services. It specializes in information technology service, asset management with project, portfolio, enterprise architecture and strategic information technology planning services. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Lysaker, Norway.

Miscellaneous Commercial ServicesCommercial Services

Odin Aero AS develops services and operations of unmanned aerial vehicles. The firm also sells and produces drones. The company was founded on July 13, 2006 and is headquartered in Trondheim, Norway.

Packaged SoftwareTechnology Services

ABAX AS engages in the provision of telematics devices. It develops, produces, markets, and trades electronic communication technology products and vehicular technologies. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Larvik, Norway.

Oil & Gas ProductionEnergy Minerals

MOSE Innovation AS S is a holding company that develops mobile systems for spill cleanup. It develops the MOSE System - a handheld tool for efficient recovery of oil and chemical spills in the coastal zone. Its technology makes the process efficient in several ways: resource consumption, performance and results and HSE (health, safety and environment). Its oil spill containment kits and systems are designed to capture spills of oil, drilling fluids, paint and hydraulic fluids, picking up spills. The company was founded in 2010 in Trondheim, Norway.

Industrial MachineryProducer Manufacturing

Hystorsys AS provides hydrogen compressor and storage tanks. It develops, manufactures, and sells storage tanks and compression systems. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Kjeller, Norway.

Packaged SoftwareTechnology Services

Initial Force AS develops online portal for golfers. Its product Swing Catalyst Online allows access to swings and lessons from all Swing Catalyst products; and its software lets user import videos. The firm's online portal allows storing and viewing of all recorded swings. The company was founded by Kristian Rathe on September 6, 2006 and is headquartered in Trondheim, Norway.

Miscellaneous Commercial ServicesCommercial Services

Ceramic Powder Technology AS is a holding company that specializes in the development and synthesis of advanced ceramic powders. Its products include periodic table, product portfolio, and toolbox. The firm also provides solid oxide cells, gas separation membranes, and lead-free electroceramics. The company was founded by Tor Grande, Mari-Ann Einarsrud, and Kjell Wiik in October 2007 and is headquartered in Heimdal, Norway.

Food: Meat/Fish/DairyConsumer Non-Durables

Icefresh AS distributes frozen and fresh seafood products. Its processing solutions include: nitrogen freezing, storage at ultra low temperatures, and science-based method for defrosting. The firm processes pieces of skinless and boneless salmon and halibut wrapped in bite-sized portions. The company was founded by Johan Fredrik Dahle on March 28, 2006 and is headquartered in Stavanger, Norway.

Computer PeripheralsElectronic Technology

One2Touch AS operates as an embedded hardware and software engineering services company specializing near field communication. It develops wireless keyboards and battery-less keypad. The company was founded by Torbjorn Aasen on June 2, 2009 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

Water UtilitiesUtilities

Clarity WTS AS is a holding company that offers patented technology for removal of organic waste and nutrients (also called Dissolved Organic Compounds) from water sources. The Clarity technology can be used both in salt water and fresh water. The company was founded by Steinar Joneid in 2005 and is headquartered in Trondheim, Norway.

RailroadsTransportation

It develops a warning and safety solution for level crossings. The firm technology detects light trains and heavy trains. The company was founded in August 2009 and is headquartered in Lysaker, Norway.

Industrial MachineryProducer Manufacturing

Industrial MachineryProducer Manufacturing

Hybrid Energy AS commercializes heat pump and building energy systems in the industry. It assists industry with consulting, design, and installation of energy solutions to the client’s specific needs. The firm also performs energy audits and pilot projects. It develops a patented Hybrid Heat Pump System for delivering high temperatures. The company was founded by Bjarne Ragnar Horntvedt in 2004 and is headquartered in Lysaker, Norway.
